title: Friend Time in Game Not Updating
body:
Haven't reproduced this yet but:

With the app open in background my friends list had stopped updating, however time in game still counted up.

The only action that updated the list was by entering the settings menu. (other pages, chat, add a friend etc did not force the update).

Will post again if I get a solid repro.

replies.body:
After some investigation I can confirm that this occurs **when the phone is using wifi ** instead of the mobile network.

It appears that on wifi the app doesn't update regularly (unless there's a log out or some menu change).

Switching off the wifi will lead to the app auto-updating.

This has happened to me a few times. If you're friend starts a game when the app is in running in the background, then you open the app it shows how long since they started that game. Mine fixed by refreshing (dragging down) immediately
